gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 120, Bulls 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Bulls, 120-104. Tyrese Haliburton recorded 21 points, a new career-high 20 assists, and zero turnovers for the Pacers, with Myles Turner adding 24 points and six rebounds in the victory. Patrick Williams tallied 22 points, five rebounds, and three assists for the Bulls in the defeat. The Pacers improve to 16-14 in the regular season, while the Bulls fall to 14-19.
